## Summary

Describe what changed and why.

## Type of change

- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Docs
- [ ] Security hardening

## Scope

- [ ] Client
- [ ] Server
- [ ] Both

## Validation

- [ ] `npm --prefix Client run build` passed
- [ ] `npm --prefix Server run test` passed (or N/A)
- [ ] Manual test completed for affected flow

## API / Data Contract Impact

- [ ] No API contract changes
- [ ] API contract changed and corresponding client updates are included
- [ ] DB schema/model changed and migration/backfill notes are included

## Security / Config Checks

- [ ] No secrets committed
- [ ] Env variable changes documented in `docs/ENVIRONMENT_REFERENCE.md`
- [ ] Auth/permission checks verified for new or changed endpoints

## Docs

- [ ] README or docs updated if behavior changed

## Commit Message

Use the repository convention:

`STATUS(<code>): short description`
